A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The Last Jedi is an action packed movie. Just when you think the movie will end\, it comes back to life (3 times). The movie is good\, however the character of Rey didnt develop enough. Finn was not developed either. The movie couldnt decide who was going to be the main protagonist. I was very disappointed that the latest Star Wars decided to kill the prior iconic heroes. Perhaps its Disney sticking its thumb at Lucasfilms.
